title: Instructional Designer / Learning Designer
description:
The successful Instructional Designer / E-learning Designer will need the following to be considered:

- Thorough understanding of Authoring tools such as; Storyline, Captivate, GoMo, etc.

- Experience with Canvas Platform will be added advantage

- Will interact with SME’s for designing instructional for the learning

- Previous experience scripting, storyboarding, and developing a range of learning solutions

- Will also review the storyboards and courses for instructional accuracy before delivering them to the client

- A portfolio/work example to showcase previous work

- Strong understanding of learning theory and Instructional Design methods

- Excellent English communication skills (Verbal + Written)

title: Business Development Manager
description:
• Identify and develop new sales opportunities within assigned territory through networking and cold calling efforts.
  • Strong business acumen with the ability to manage bottom-line profitability
  • Will be responsible for the sales effort, new students acquisitions, and New Partner tie-ups from the African Region
  • Devising new selling strategies and improving current sales processes.
  • Building an instant connection with new customers and onboarding them onto the platform
  • Conceptualizing & organizing events and marketing campaigns to ensure footfalls
  • Plan and ensure timely follow-ups for all sales and marketing activities
  • Relationship Building with Schools, Colleges, Corporates, Employers, Consultants.
  • Passion for customer relationship management with an innate sense of service.

 

Requirements:

·        Must be a Graduate

·        Experience in Education Industry is a must

·        Good Communication Skills

·        Willing to Travel, as and when required

·        Self-driven and highly passionate in sales, marketing, and relationship building.

·        Ability to deal with diversity

title: Admission Advisor
description:
DESCRIPTION

The role aims to provide an excellent and efficient education sales service, from dealing with general education inquiries and converting to sales, liaising with Admin on processing sales.

Primary Responsibilities

  • Provide Information, Advice, and Guidance to prospective students & trainees.
  • Conduct initial screening of the students based on the respective course entry requirement
  • Complete all the pre-enrolment paperwork such as initial assessments, Enrolment forms.
  • Issue the offer letters, course brochures, and welcome mails
  • Input the key information (learner name, contact details) into the database.
  • Verify the learner paperwork for the accuracy and suitability of the enrolment paperwork
  • Follow-up the learners with their application
  • Capture the details on learner withdrawal and reasons for withdrawal
  • Generate new leads of prospective learners and build partnerships with schools and colleges.
  • Collect the database from local sources and build network business and employment recruitment companies and corporates.
  • Dealing with incoming calls from prospective students. Have a persuasive telephone manner as the call aims to secure enrollment with the student before they end the call.
  • Make outbound calls to people who have registered an interest and engage with the student from the point of contact.
  • Provide excellent Customer Service on a wide range of courses
  • To create, collate and schedule education and events content for college’s social media channels including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram and build connections and interactions across all channels
  • Provide support to the education sales managers on specific projects as required
  • Adhere to agreed protocols and procedures and participate in regular team meetings and conference calls with college staff and external contacts as appropriate
  • Identify and undertake training and development as required to meet personal and business needs.
  • You may, on occasions, be required to undertake additional or other duties as appropriate.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

We are looking for an experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to help us in our online marketing efforts. The Digital Marketing Specialist will be involved in assist in the planning, execution, and optimization of the company's marketing efforts. The ideal candidate will have a passion for all things marketing and technology. You must be hands-on with the concepts related to digital marketing and how the Internet can become a strong asset to achieving growth in terms of more business and more revenue. You will be tech-savvy and intuitive with great ideas to strengthen our marketing campaign.


RESPONSIBILITIES

• Assist in the formulation of strategies to build a lasting digital connection with consumers.

• Plan and monitor the ongoing company presence on social media (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, etc.)

• Provide creative ideas for content marketing and update the website.

• Collaborate with designers to improve user experience.

• Acquire insight into online marketing trends and keep strategies up-to-date.

• Prepare online newsletters and promotional Blogs and organize their distribution through various channels.

• Be active on all social media platforms with the latest trends to stand out in Education Industry

title: Partnership Manager
description:
Job description

We are looking for a Partnership Manager to grow our business development team, to continue building our partnerships with education providers and universities in the UK and globally. Salary will be best in the Industry.


Key responsibilities


  • Engagement with the UK and international education providers and universities with regards to Edubex products and services.
  • Identify and research new opportunities for partnerships within the UK and some key international prospects towards qualifying leads and opportunities.
  • Support and maintain relationships with key accounts to understand their requirements and support their understanding of Edubex.
  • Gather and report market intelligence to inform Edubex planning and marketing campaigns
  • Undertake other duties considered within your skill and competence to contribute to the organization as a whole.


Who can apply?


  • Candidates with an MBA degree from reputed B-schools will be preferred. Experience in the edtech sector, as well as startups, is a plus. - Have business development experience ideally within a relevant sector.
  • Have excellent verbal and written communication skills, including delivering effective presentations virtually.
  • Have confidence in dealing with customers by phone and strong negotiation skills
  • Be able to prioritize workload and manage time effectively to ensure that, deadlines are met.
  • Must be a Self-motivated, proactive team player with innovative ideas to inspire customer loyalty and adoption.
  • Should be able to work without much guidance or oversight.

title: Content Developer
description:
We are looking for a Content/concept developer to join our team immediately.

  • have to create a concept for promotional videos for the courses
  • Prepare Script, Storyboard.
  • develop ideas and create and develop routines to produce a well-polished promotional video
  • Good communication and writing skills
